thread.title: Obama Criticizes Russia Over Syria Strikes
thread.title_full: Obama Criticizes Russia Over Syria Strikes - WSJ

author: Carol E. Lee
title: Obama Criticizes Russia Over Syria Strikes
text:
WASHINGTON—President Barack Obama criticized Russia for what he called indiscriminate airstrikes in Syria this week against members of the opposition fighting Syrian President Bashar al-Assad’s regime as well as against Islamic State militants.
Mr. Obama, in his first remarks on the crisis since Russia’s military buildup in Syria, said Friday that Russia’s air campaign as executed so far would keep the U.S. from working with Moscow... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
